title: Game Client can no longer Full Screen/Out of Monitor Signal
body: Having problems getting game to be in Full Screen. When the game/client loads up, my monitor says "Signal Out of Range" I was playing perfectly with the same setup/monitor forever and now it has an error all of a sudden. Possible bug/glitch due to new patch.

replies.body: If you're still getting that "out of range" issue, you can try using the alt+enter method of switching between fullscreen and windowed. If you're still getting that error after switching back and forth, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look into your specific problem one on one!
